com.ibasco.agql.core

Interface PacketEncoder<P extends Packet>

  • Type Parameters:
    P - The type of Packet
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPacketEncoder, SourceQuerySinglePacketEncoder
    Functional Interface:
    This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.

    @FunctionalInterface
public interface PacketEncoder<P extends Packet>
    Encodes Packet instances it's ByteBuf representation.
    Author:
    Rafael Luis Ibasco

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf encode(P packet)
      Encodes a Packet into a ByteBuf

    • Method Detail

      • encode

        io.netty.buffer.ByteBuf encode(P packet)
                        throws PacketEncodeException
        Encodes a Packet into a ByteBuf
        Parameters:
        packet - The Packet to be encoded
        Returns:
        The encoded ByteBuf
        Throws:
        PacketEncodeException - When an error occurs during the encoding process
